mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_id, s.specialization_id, s.doctor_id, d.name AS doctorName, d.photo_url, d.title_id, d.introduction, s.date, s.time, s.available_number FROM schedule s INNER JOIN doctor d ON s.doctor_id = d.doctor_id where s.specialization_id = #{specializationId} and s.date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

SELECT s.schedule_id, s.specialization_id, s.doctor_id, d.name AS doctorName, d.photo_url, d.title_id, s.date, s.time, s.available_number FROM schedule s INNER JOIN doctor d ON s.doctor_id = d.doctor_id where s.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and s.date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

SELECT s.schedule_id, s.specialization_id, s.doctor_id, d.name AS doctorName, d.photo_url, d.title_id, s.date, s.time, s.available_number, (SELECT CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(tb.start_time, '%H:%i'), ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(tb.end_time, '%H:%i') ) AS appointment_time_info FROM time_bucket tb WHERE tb.bucket_id = s.time) AS time_info FROM schedule s INNER JOIN doctor d ON s.doctor_id = d.doctor_id
